sentences.en: A private detective was hired to conduct the investigation.
sentences.cn: 雇了一名私人侦探进行调查。

sentences.en: An investigation is underway to find out how the disaster happened.
sentences.cn: 调查已经展开，以查明灾难是如何发生的。

sentences.en: But as the investigation continued, the plot began to thicken.
sentences.cn: 但是随着调查的继续深入，情况开始变得复杂起来。

sentences.en: DNA fingerprinting has proved the clincher in this investigation.
sentences.cn: 在这次调查中，DNA指纹鉴定起了决定性的作用。

sentences.en: He agreed to co-operate with the police investigation.
sentences.cn: 他同意配合警方的调查。

sentences.en: He pressed for a full investigation, but was warned off.
sentences.cn: 他迫切要求展开全面调查，但是被叫停。

sentences.en: He refused to soft-pedal an investigation into the scandal.
sentences.cn: 他拒绝降低对这起丑闻的调查力度。

sentences.en: I didn't lose too much sleep over that investigation.
sentences.cn: 我并不太担心那个调查。

sentences.en: Judge Frederick Lacey headed up the investigation.
sentences.cn: 弗雷德里克·莱西法官负责该项调查。

sentences.en: The cause of the crash was under investigation.
The investigation continued for nearly three years.
The investigation is being handled by Scotland Yard's anti-terrorist branch.
sentences.cn: 调查由伦敦警察厅反恐部门负责。

sentences.en: The investigation snowballed from there and has since led to several arrests.
sentences.cn: 从那里开始，调查范围迅速扩大，有几人已经被逮捕。

sentences.en: The investigation will rely on existing powers to subpoena documents.
sentences.cn: 该调查将凭借现有权力要求将各种相关文件呈堂。

sentences.en: The legal authorities cranked up the investigation.
sentences.cn: 执法部门加大了调查力度。

sentences.en: The police have launched an investigation into the incident.
sentences.cn: 警方已对该事件展开调查。

sentences.en: The police investigation was a joke. A total cover-up.
sentences.cn: 警方的调查简直荒唐可笑，完全是在掩盖真相。
